messages.content: Imagine an economy that puts the public first. Imagine an economy that fights inequality and protects the environment. It’s time to change the system and give more power to ordinary people. Vote Green and help us build a society that works for the Common Good.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 10,000 more police set up community policing boards to reform procedures for dealing with major and complex crimes.
Scrap university tuition fees and fund schools fairly.
Take serious action to combat climate change and eliminate nuclear weapons.
Unlock council held funds for 500,000 social housing units and build 100,000 a year.
End austerity and restore public service funding with progressive taxation and a Robin Hood tax.
End the creeping NHS privatization and reinstate nurse bursaries.
Bring Academies and Free Schools into local authority systems.
3% raise for anyone on workers contracts and end the freeze on welfare.

mentions.candidate: Chris Jordan, Green Party candidate for Torridge and West Devon.

issues.economy: End austerity and restore public services funding with progressive taxation and a Robin Hood tax.
issues.education: Scrap university tuition fees and fund schools fairly. Bring Academies and Free Schools into local authority systems.
issues.environment: Take serious action to combat climate change.
issues.health: End the creeping NHS privatization and reinstate nurse bursaries.
issues.lawCrime: Recruit 10,000 more police set up community policing boards to reform procedures for dealing with major and complex crimes.
issues.socialWelfare: 3% raise for anyone on workers contracts and end the freeze on welfare.

community.content: Unlock council held funds for 500,000 social housing units and build 100,000 a year.

leaflet.personalStatement: Chris Jordan is married and has lived in Holsworthy for 25 years. He served in the Royal Navy, ran the Bridge Antiques Centre in Bideford, and was an independent Northam Town Councillor. Engaged with local community and environmental groups.

images.caption: Chris Jordan, Green Party candidate for Torridge and West Devon.

Imagine an economy that fights inequality and protects the environment.

Build a society that works for the Common Good.
Chris Jordan looks forward to serving the people of Torridge and West Devon.

Eliminate nuclear weapons.
